Items.Title: Oversight - DOE’s Response to Incidents of Bullying, Harassment, and Discrimination in NYC Schools and Efforts to Improve School Climate.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - DOE’s Response to Incidents of Bullying, Harassment, and Discrimination in NYC Schools and Efforts to Improve School Climate.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education to post contact information for each school related to reporting incidents of bullying, harassment, intimidation and discrimination
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the DOE to post contact information for each school related to reporting incidents of bullying, harassment, intimidation and discrimination.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education to provide data related to student participation in meals provided by the department in school
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the DOE to provide data related to student participation in meals provided by the dept in school.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education to distribute information regarding educational rights and departmental policies related to interactions with non-local law enforcement
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the DOE to distribute information regarding educational rights and departmental policies related to interactions with non-local law enforcement and federal immigration authorities.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education to report on gay-straight or gender-sexuality alliance organizations
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the DOE to report on gay-straight or gender-sexuality alliance organizations.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education to provide curricular and other supports to protect lesbian, gay, bisexual, queer or questioning (LGBQ) and transgender and gender nonconforming (TGNC) and other vulnerable students and to ensure that administrators, teachers and students in all middle and high schools are informed that, under the Equal Access Act, students have a right to convene and participate in a Gender-Sexuality Alliance (GSA) at school.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOE to provide curricular and other supports to protect lesbian, gay, bisexual, queer or questioning (LGBQ) and transgender and gender nonconforming (TGNC) and other vulnerable students.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education to report information on student-to-student bullying, harassment, intimidation and discrimination
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Requiring DOE to report information on student-to-student bullying, harassment, intimidation and discrimination.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Information regarding summer meals.
